MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA13 postcode area of Kilmacolm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.09pm. Our engineers are on their way to Gilburn Road substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.20pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
